overview:
Travis Steffen is a fitness and fashion mogul, published author, and motivational speaker.

His business ventures to date include:

WorkoutBOX - an online health and fitness community and major retailer of fitness training programs. SupplementShelf - an online retailer of major nutritional and Fitness Supplement brands. Synn - a lifestyle apparel and mixed martial arts clothing line. Fight Gear Central - an online retailer of mixed martial arts and combat sports apparel and Fight Gear. TravisSteffen.com - Travis’s private consulting firm and bio website. a href=”http://www.steffenacquisitions.com/”>Steffen Acquisitions - Travis’s holding company for all equity in ventures he’s involved in.

Travis is also the author of the poker-inspired fitness book Peak Performance Poker which pushes professional poker players to approach their game as a professional athlete would approach their sport.

His new book, tentatively titled Beating the Game, is currently being finished and edited. Look for its release in mid 2011.

He currently lives in Los Angeles, California.
